Title: Additional information about your API call. Try to use verbs that match both request type (fetching vs modifying) and plurality (one vs multiple).
URL: The URL Structure (path only, no root url)

URL Params.URL Param: If URL params exist, specify them in accordance with name mentioned in URL section. Separate into optional and required. Document data constraints.

Data Params.Data Param: If making a post request, what should the body payload look like? URL Params rules apply here too.

Success Response.Content: What should the status code be on success and is there any returned data? This is useful when people need to to know what their callbacks should expect!

Methods.Sample Call: Just a sample call to your endpoint in a runnable format ($.ajax call or a curl request) - this makes life easier and more predictable.
Methods.Notes: This is where all uncertainties, commentary, discussion etc. can go. I recommend timestamping and identifying oneself when leaving comments here.
